name: Pot Shot - Crushing Case
description:
Pot Shot - Crushing Case is a brand new agile and casual type of game. The game has a beautiful and simple design style, rich level content, and players can use the cannon to launch as much as possible to smash objects on the table and get a high score! Unlock all kinds of cannons through a constant level clearance. Each cannon has different shapes and shells, and can also unlock powerful magic, such as the laser, black hole, continuous shooting, etc.

- Level system:
More than 150 types of standards levels can be cleared through different strategic dimensions;
- Cannon system:
Diamonds can unlock more than 15 kinds of cannons which have various styles; players can choose to use before entering the level;
- Magic system:
Diamonds obtained through level victory can be used to unlock five different effects of magic; magic is more potent than ordinary bullets;
- Collection system:
You can collect the corresponding level Illustration after clearing the individual BOSS level;
- Scene system:
Players can use diamonds unlock 12 beautiful scenes, and use any scene you want in any round;
- Lucky award:
After each level upgrade, players can get a chance to get the lucky prize; Lucky people can get ten times higher diamond rewards.

Let us know and leave some comments if you like this game, please.
